message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the synthesis reaction between magnesium metal (Mg) and oxygen gas (O2) to form magnesium oxide (MgO)?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the synthesis reaction between magnesium metal (Mg) and oxygen gas (O2) to form magnesium oxide (MgO) is:

2 Mg + O2 â†’ 2 MgO
